title: Kevin O'Riordan
text:
Kevin O'Riordan (birth unknown) is a <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who plays for the <a href="Treaty%20City%20Titans">Treaty City Titans</a> in the <a href="Irish%20Elite%20League">Irish Elite League</a>. He is a member of <a href="Ireland%20men%27s%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Ireland men's national rugby league team</a>.
Background.
Kevin O'Riordan was born in Ireland.
